Key Match Events: Lewis Miller scored his first international goal before half-time
Nishan Velupillay scored his debut international goal in stoppage time
Post-Match Reflections: Tony Popovic discussed his first game in charge as coach
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Adelaide, Australia
Others: Australia is aiming for a sixth straight World Cup appearance
The top two from each group qualify directly for the World Cup while the third- and fourth-place finishers advance to a fourth stage of qualification
